title: Looking Back: Link Escaped a Pyramid Scheme
description:
While Rhett and Link are out on vacation, check out this 2nd throwback episode Link details how he was able to escape a pyramid scheme multiple times. Link also explains what happened when he took Rhett's advice on staring at his neighbor while he showers, and they finally settle how to end an email...or not.
Originally aired 10/27/2019.
﻿If you want new episodes, be sure to follow Dispatches From Myrtle Beach, Link's new podcast with his dad! Available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you get your podcasts!
﻿Don't miss the biggest Mythical live event of the year! Visit MythiConTickets.com for more info!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
